title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Collaborative Design Workshop for Language Learning App Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive three core features of a language learning app through the collaborative design process
Learners can create interface prototypes for language learning apps from a user experience (UX) perspective
Learners can revise and supplement app design proposals based on peer feedback and incorporate them into final presentation materials

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
